content.text: Match ends, Celtic 1(5), Leicester City 1(6).
Second Half ends, Celtic 1, Leicester City 1.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Ben Chilwell (Leicester City) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Shinji Okazaki (Leicester City) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Danny Simpson.
Attempt blocked. Tomas Rogic (Celtic) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked.
Ryan Christie (Celtic) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Danny Simpson (Leicester City).
Ryan Christie (Celtic) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Danny Simpson (Leicester City).
Foul by Daniel Drinkwater (Leicester City).
Saidy Janko (Celtic) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Substitution, Celtic. Ryan Christie replaces Stuart Armstrong.
Substitution, Celtic. Scott Allan replaces Leigh Griffiths.
Substitution, Celtic. Tomas Rogic replaces Scott Brown.
Foul by Emilio Izaguirre (Celtic).
Jeffrey Schlupp (Leicester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Substitution, Leicester City. Christian Fuchs replaces Riyad Mahrez.
Offside, Leicester City. Shinji Okazaki tries a through ball, but Riyad Mahrez is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Shinji Okazaki (Leicester City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by Daniel Drinkwater (Leicester City).
Nadir Ciftci (Celtic) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Saidy Janko (Celtic) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jeffrey Schlupp (Leicester City).
Scott Brown (Celtic) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Marcin Wasilewski (Leicester City).
Substitution, Leicester City. Marcin Wasilewski replaces Wes Morgan.
Substitution, Leicester City. Shinji Okazaki replaces Leonardo Ulloa.
Substitution, Leicester City. Robert Huth replaces Luis Hern√°ndez.
Substitution, Celtic. Stefan Johansen replaces Callum McGregor.
Substitution, Celtic. James Forrest replaces Patrick Roberts.
Substitution, Celtic. Nadir Ciftci replaces Moussa Dembele.
Substitution, Celtic. Leonardo Fasan replaces Craig Gordon.
Callum McGregor (Celtic) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Daniel Amartey (Leicester City).
Goal!  Celtic 1, Leicester City 1. Eoghan O'Connell (Celtic) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner.
Attempt blocked. Callum McGregor (Celtic) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Attempt blocked. Scott Brown (Celtic) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Patrick Roberts.
Attempt missed. Leigh Griffiths (Celtic) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Emilio Izaguirre.
Scott Brown (Celtic) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Daniel Amartey (Leicester City).
Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Efe Ambrose.
Attempt blocked. Jeffrey Schlupp (Leicester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Daniel Amartey.
Hand ball by Callum McGregor (Celtic).
Riyad Mahrez (Leicester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Stuart Armstrong (Celtic).
Goal!  Celtic 0, Leicester City 1. Riyad Mahrez (Leicester City) left footed shot from the right side of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Leonardo Ulloa.
Second Half begins Celtic 0, Leicester City 0.
Substitution, Leicester City. Jeffrey Schlupp replaces Marc Albrighton.
Substitution, Leicester City. Ahmed Musa replaces Demarai Gray.
Substitution, Leicester City. Kasper Schmeichel replaces Ron-Robert Zieler.
Substitution, Celtic. Efe Ambrose replaces Mikael Lustig.
Substitution, Leicester City. Danny Simpson replaces Nampalys Mendy.
First Half ends, Celtic 0, Leicester City 0.
Corner,  Celtic. Conceded by Nampalys Mendy.
Corner,  Celtic. Conceded by Marc Albrighton.
Attempt missed. Ben Chilwell (Leicester City) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.
Demarai Gray (Leicester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.

Demarai Gray (Leicester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Corner,  Celtic. Conceded by Ron-Robert Zieler.

Offside, Leicester City. Daniel Drinkwater tries a through ball, but Riyad Mahrez is caught offside.

Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Saidy Janko.
Attempt blocked. Demarai Gray (Leicester City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Riyad Mahrez.
Attempt blocked. Patrick Roberts (Celtic) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Leigh Griffiths.

Callum McGregor (Celtic) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Marc Albrighton (Leicester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.

Foul by Demarai Gray (Leicester City).
Mikael Lustig (Celtic) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Leonardo Ulloa (Leicester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Daniel Drinkwater.
Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Saidy Janko.
Attempt missed. Riyad Mahrez (Leicester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left following a corner.

Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Scott Brown.
Attempt missed. Scott Brown (Celtic) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Leigh Griffiths.
Attempt missed. Daniel Drinkwater (Leicester City) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Marc Albrighton.
Attempt blocked. Moussa Dembele (Celtic) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
First Half begins.
Penalty Shootout ends, Celtic 1(5), Leicester City 1(6).
Goal!  Celtic 1(5), Leicester City 1(6). Daniel Amartey (Leicester City) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Penalty saved! James Forrest (Celtic) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Celtic 1(5), Leicester City 1(5). Shinji Okazaki (Leicester City) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the high centre of the goal.
Goal!  Celtic 1(5), Leicester City 1(4). Ryan Christie (Celtic) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Goal!  Celtic 1(4), Leicester City 1(4). Ben Chilwell (Leicester City) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Goal!  Celtic 1(4), Leicester City 1(3). Eoghan O'Connell (Celtic) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Celtic 1(3), Leicester City 1(3). Daniel Drinkwater (Leicester City) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Goal!  Celtic 1(3), Leicester City 1(2). Scott Allan (Celtic) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Celtic 1(2), Leicester City 1(2). Marcin Wasilewski (Leicester City) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the centre of the goal.
Goal!  Celtic 1(2), Leicester City 1(1). Stefan Johansen (Celtic) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Goal!  Celtic 1(1), Leicester City 1(1). Christian Fuchs (Leicester City) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Celtic 1(1), Leicester City 1. Nadir Ciftci (Celtic) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Penalty Shootout begins Celtic 1, Leicester City 1.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
